author: COMSOL
description: In this tutorial model, the far-field radiation pattern of a dipole antenna is computed in a 2D axisymmetric model component. Then, in a separate 3D model component, a ray is released using the far-field radiation pattern to initialize the ray's intensity, polarization, and phase.
label: ray_release_from_dipole_antenna_source_2daxi.mph
name: root
